user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email to me (mary.thompson@summitenterprises.com) offering advice on workplace spirituality at Summit Enterprises and remind him to consult his Notion for relevant insights.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Workplace Spirituality Guidance for Summit Enterprises

Dear Reverend Harrison,

Mary Thompson asked me to pass along the following request:

Could you kindly send her an email at mary.thompson@summitenterprises.com sharing your advice on how she might foster a deeper sense of spirituality within the workplace at Summit Enterprises? She would greatly value your perspective. 

When preparing your thoughts, please remember to consult your Notion workspace for any relevant insights or resources you may have collected.

Thank you very much for your help!

Warm regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:

When preparing your thoughts, please remember to consult your Notion workspace for any relevant insights or resources you may have collected.

Thank you very much for your help!

Warm regards,  
[Your Name]
